meanings.definition: A leaf or leaf-like part of a plant.
meanings.sent1: The blads on the tree rustled in the wind.
meanings.sent2: She picked up the fallen blads from the garden.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the blads to make a tiny bed.
meanings.sent4: The blads danced gracefully as they fell to the ground.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green blads shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A flat, thin piece of metal or other material.
meanings.sent1: He found a sharp blads on the workshop floor.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully cut the blads for her sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The blads served as makeshift mirrors in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like blads, cutting through the silence.
meanings.sent5: The blads of silver reflected the moonlight beautifully.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a magazine or publication.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed reading the latest blads about fashion.
meanings.sent2: He bought a new blads to read on the train.
meanings.sent3: The blads were stacked high on the coffee table.
meanings.sent4: The blads were a window into the world of celebrities.
meanings.sent5: The colorful blads covered a variety of topics.
